snippet: A commercial during Bulls telecasts features Derrick Rose’s return from a torn anterior cruciate ligament. In reality, he is expected to rejoin the Bulls sometime in February.
abstract: Adidas commercial that imagines Chicago Bulls point guard Derrick Rose’s return from injury is a hot, drawing attention on local and national NBA shows and digitally.
lead_paragraph: A commercial during Bulls telecasts features Derrick Rose’s return from a torn anterior cruciate ligament. In reality, he is expected to rejoin the Bulls sometime in February.

headline.seo: Adidas Chronicles Recovery of Bulls’ Derrick Rose in Documentary
headline.main: Advertisement Makes Fans’ Dreams a Reality
headline.print_headline: Advertisement Makes Fans’ Dreams a Reality
